name: JINGOKU
description:
Welcome to JINGOKU!

 速い木へようこそ！

JINGOKU is minigame Jenga - complete as many minigames as you can before the tower collapses! 

You’ll earn achievements, see your stats and find out how you rank compared to other players around the world.

Your ability be read Japanese will be of no use to you here, but fast and precise mouse skills shall see you well.

Be sure to download the game if you want to participate in our online global leaderboards!

Please leave a rating on our LDJAM page!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/jingoku

Like our style? Check out WAVER: A Typing Adventure on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1393690/WAVER_A_Typing_Adventure/
